Package com.africanbongo.clearskyes.controller.customviews

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AstroView
    Custom view shown on current today page at the bottom of the screen Contains the animated sunset, sunrise, moon set, and moonrise icons As well as text views to show the times of theses properties
    CurrentWeatherViewUp  
    CustomNavigationView  
    DayWeatherViewUp
    Custom view for holding minimal WeatherDay data
    LocationButton
    Button linked to state adapter to show weather for a certain location Upon installation of the app, the current location is taken to get a weather location
    TimePreference
    Show dialog with a TimePicker object, credit to StackOverflow solution
